instruction:
Create a detailed caption for an Instagram post about a discount. A proper caption should explain the product, offer the discount, and tell the user how to claim it.

Product: Golang course
Product description: teaching the foundational skills for building cloud services, web applications, DevOps tools, and backend development
Discount: 50%
How to claim: Use the coupon code: GOLANG
output: "Learn Golang and save big with our 50% discount! 🎉 Use the coupon code: GOLANG to claim your discount on our comprehensive Golang course. 💻 This course will teach you the foundational skills for building cloud services, web applications, DevOps tools, and backend development. 🚀 Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to level up your skills and save money! 💰 #Golang #Discount #CouponCode"
